INSERT IGNORE INTO t_request_info (MOBILE, IDCARD, OPERATORS_TYPE, PROVINCE_CODE, URL_TYPE, URL, START_DATE, END_DATE, SIGN, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) values
(#{item.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.operatorsType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.urlType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_request_info SET STATUS=#{status},UPDATE_TIME=now() WHERE SIGN=#{sign} AND STATUS=#{originStatus}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(END_DATE) FROM t_request_info WHERE MOBILE=#{mobile} AND IDCARD=#{idcard}
SELECT FROM t_request_info WHERE OPERATORS_TYPE=#{operatorsType} AND STATUS=#{status} ORDER BY ID DESC limit 100
